title: feat: add environment map configuration and default environment map for GLB models
description: Adds environment map configuration and a default environment map for GLB models to improve rendering quality.
body: - Introduced `configureRenderer` function to set up the renderer for proper color space and tone mapping. - Added `getDefaultEnvironmentMap` function to generate a default environment map for GLB models, improving their brightness and appearance. - Updated `GltfModel` to apply the default environment map to materials, ensuring consistent rendering. - Created tests to verify the application of the environment map to GLB models. /claim #507

title: add supoort rect_border_radius to smtpads and plated hole
description: Adds support for rectangular border radius to SMT pads and plated holes in the PCB design.

title: Resolve relative footprint URLs and add fallback
description: Resolves relative footprint URLs by constructing asset URLs based on the projects base URL and adds a fallback mechanism for loading footprints.

title: Fix autorouter routing through board outline, Add autorouter U-outline regression snapshot
description: Fixes autorouter routing through a U-shaped board outline and adds a regression test to ensure correct behavior.
body:
## Summary
- update the simple route json outline test to use a U-shaped board with the local autorouter enabled
- capture a PCB snapshot proving the autorouted trace follows the U-shaped outline

## Testing
- BUN_UPDATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 bun test tests/utils/autorouting/simple-route-json-outline.test.tsx
- bunx tsc --noEmit

------
https://chatgpt.com/codex/tasks/task_b_68df59bb16c0832e829d0a91fc50736c

title: Add MicroMod and Greenpill board fixtures for PCB packing test
description: Adds MicroModBoard and GreenpillBoard fixtures with full pin mapping and a snapshot test for PCB packing verification.
body:
Bumped calculate-packing to 0.0.41

Added MicroModBoard fixture with full pin mapping, outline, and footprint generator

Added GreenpillBoard fixture with jumper, reset, LED, and passive components

Added snapshot test repro1-packing-imported-board to verify imported boards pack correctly

This sets up reusable board fixtures and a repro case for PCB packing.

title: Switch 3D snapshots to circuit-json-to-gltf + poppygl (PNG)
description: Replaces the simple-3d SVG pipeline with GLTF-based rendering, generating 3D snapshots as PNGs using poppygls rasterizer.
body:
• Replace the simple-3d SVG pipeline with GLTF-based rendering:               
    • circuit-json -> circuit-json-to-gltf (GLTF/GLB)                          
    • GLTF/GLB -> PNG via poppygl                                              
 • 3D snapshots are now PNGs, generated headlessly with poppygl’s pure JS      
   rasterizer.    

/claim #1417
/closes #1417

title: fix: The `extrudeLinear` operation can have an inverted winding order
description: Fixes the inverted winding order issue in the extrudeLinear operation, ensuring correct polygon rendering.
body: ref: https://github.com/tscircuit/jscad-to-gltf/issues/4 The GLF files generate gltf model link (could not upload github did not allow here in the comment so giving Drive) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GTr-ccHnXA26bYYtCLMAwK-qKV1Abg7p/view?usp=sharing

title: Pinout: dynamic scaling for small pads, improved label separation
description: Enhances pinout diagrams for small-pad boards by dynamically scaling UI elements and improving label separation for better readability.
body:
• Make pinout diagrams more readable on small-pad boards by dynamically scaling UI elements and tightening SVG bounds.    
 • Improve label stacking/spacing so primary vs. other labels are visually separated.

title: Show problem outline in initial visualization
description: Draws the PCB outline in the initial problem visualization for visibility before solving starts, reuses the outline polygon when available, and modifies the capacity mesh outline visualization by removing explicit stroke width and adding point typing for linting compliance.
body:
## Summary
- draw the PCB outline in the initial problem visualization so it is visible before solving starts
- reuse that outline polygon when available while keeping the existing bounds box visualization
- remove the explicit stroke width from the capacity mesh outline visualization and add point typing to satisfy linting

## Testing

title: feat: support polygon outlines in capacity node solver
description: Adds support for an optional outline polygon in the capacity node solver, allowing the solver to treat space outside the outline as obstacles and includes a new fixture for demonstration.
body:
## Summary
- add an optional outline polygon to SimpleRouteJson and teach the capacity mesh node solvers to treat space outside the outline as obstacles via the new polygon helpers
- upgrade @tscircuit/math-utils so the solver can use polygon-aware utilities while reworking node bound calculations
- add a polygon-outline fixture that demonstrates routing constrained by a board outline

## Testing
- bun test tests/auto-capacity-depth.test.ts
- bun test tests/core1.test.tsx
- bunx tsc --noEmit

------
https://chatgpt.com/codex/tasks/task_b_68df35355e28832eaab45eb41dec7c7e

title: Fix path simplification tail fallback and add regression test
description: Fixes path simplification fallback to original segment when no 45 path can reach the tail, ensuring connectivity and adding a regression test for bug d3f3be1b.
body:
## Summary
- ensure the simplified path solver falls back to the original segment when no 45° path can reach the tail, preserving vias and end points
- add the downloaded bug report assets and a regression test that exercises bug d3f3be1b with an SVG snapshot and DRC assertion
- verify the regression test asserts the final trace terminates at the expected port location

## Testing
- `BUN_UPDATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 bun test tests/bugs/bugreport6-d3f3be.test.ts`
- `bun test tests/bugs/bugreport6-d3f3be.test.ts`
- `NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" bunx tsc --noEmit`

title: Fix: show the failed connection, not the next one
description: Fixes the visualization of failed connections in the autorouting process by displaying the last failed connection instead of the next one when no candidates are available.

title: add simplified repro from the ergodox
description: Adds a simplified reproduction of an autorouting bug using a JSON fixture and a React component for debugging.

title: Fix GLB Color Loading
description: Fixes incorrectly rotated GLB models and addresses issues with GLB color loading.
body:
- **fix incorrectly rotated glb models**
- **glb colors wip**

title: Support cad_component.model_gltf_url
description: Adds support for loading GLTF models in the circuit-to-3D conversion process by including a new model_gltf_url property in cad components.

title: models from footprint strings support
description: Adds support for generating 3D models from footprint strings in circuit components.

title: glb loading support
description: Adds support for loading GLB files in the 3D circuit model conversion process.

title: add glb model example
description: Adds an example for rendering a GLB model in the circuit JSON to GLTF conversion process.

title: This PR introduces the CM5Receiver and CM5Connector components to support Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 carrier board development.
description: Adds CM5Connector and CM5Receiver components with full pinouts and footprints for Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 carrier board development.
body:
Added CM5Connector with full left/right pinouts and footprint.

Introduced CM5Receiver group with both connectors (JP1 + JP2).

Included PCB + 3D snapshots for verification.

Linked to JLCPCB part C6782225 / A_10164227_1001A1RLF.

This sets up support for the CM5 receiver connector in future designs.
/claim #14

title: Handle multiple sheet_instances entries in KicadSch
description: Changes the handling of sheet_instances in KicadSch to allow multiple entries, preserving blocks during parsing and exposing them as an array.
body:
## Summary
- treat sheet_instances as a repeatable child of kicad_sch so multiple blocks are preserved when parsing
- expose sheetInstances as an array while keeping the constructor flexible enough to accept a single instance

## Testing
- bunx tsc --noEmit
- bun test tests/sexpr/KicadSchDemos.test.ts *(fails locally: missing kicad-demos fixtures)*

title: Refactor simulator into modular files

- split the SPICE simulator into focused parsing, analysis, formatting, math, stamping, and utility modules with one exported function per file
- re-export the new modules through lib/index.ts to preserve the public API

title: remove the extra 0 its breaking junction and kicad_sch
description: This pull request removes an extra 0 from the coordinates of a Junction object in the AddSchematicTracesStage class, which was causing issues with junctions and the kicad_sch format. The change is aimed at fixing a bug that was breaking the functionality of the schematic generation.

title: PCB Support
description: Adds support for converting Circuit JSON to KiCad PCB format, including stages for initializing the PCB, adding nets, footprints, traces, vias, and graphics.
